html: A precious category of humanity—a tithe of the tithe of the earth’s inhabitants ( Isaiah 6:13)—resembles “fine gold.” These pass through the refiner’s fire when Jehovah’s judgments come upon the wicked: “I will... smelt away your dross as in a crucible and remove all your alloy” ( Isaiah 1:25). Those whom Jehovah delivers consists only of precious and semiprecious categories of humanity: “You shall adorn yourself with them all as with jewels” ( Isaiah 49:18); “In place of copper I will bring gold, in place of iron, silver; in place of wood I will bring copper, in place of stones, iron” ( Isaiah 60:17).
